author: AP
title: NHL's top draft prospect staying patient amid uncertainty
description: Top NHL prospect Alexis Lafrenière is doing his best to patiently bide his time at home
content:
Alexis Lafrenière could never have envisioned ending his prolific junior hockey career in such an anticlimactic setting.
There was no final buzzer, and the NHL’s projected top draft prospect was nowhere near an ice rink Wednesday. Lafrenière was instead sitt… [+3857 chars]
